question: Sind was annexed during the governor generalship of which of the following British personalities?
explanation: In the year 1831, Ranjit Singh gave a proposal to William Bentinck to divide Sindh between them. Bentinck was not so impressed with his suggestion. In the year 1843, the battle of Miani came to a cessation under the leadership of Charles Napier. All the amirs surrendered and annexation of Sind took place during the reign of Lord Ellenborough.
